```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
read_delim("input1.txt",
         col_names = c("col1","col3", "col4", "col2")) |>
  select(col1, col2) -> input
input
```

```{r}
input|>
  arrange(col1) |>
  select(col1)-> input1
input1
```

```{r}
input |>
  arrange(col2) |>
  select(col2) -> input2
input2
```


```{r}
input1 |>
  mutate(input2, col2) -> input3
input3
```


```{r}
input3 |>
  mutate(dif = abs(col1 - col2)) -> input4
input4
```

```{r}
input4 |>
  summarise(total = sum(dif))
```


```{r}
input3
```
```{r}
input |> 
  mutate(occurences = map_int(col1, function(x) sum(x == input$col2))) -> input5
input5
```

```{r}
input5 |>
  mutate(score = col1*occurences)
```

```{r}
input5 |>
  mutate(score = col1*occurences) |>
  summarise(total = sum(score))
```
